summary: Session 4 UI testing complete. All new frontend UI changes verified working. Backend APIs healthy. New features tested: 1) Map button in header left of greeting - WORKING, 2) Category grid fixed 5 cols × 2 rows NOT horizontal scroll - WORKING, 3) Featured restaurants with yellow star badges - WORKING, 4) Restaurant cards with RED (#C62828) background - WORKING, 5) Floating center cart button in tab bar - WORKING.

integration_issues.issue: Restaurant images stored with file:// URLs (iOS device paths) cannot load on web preview - shows Pexels fallback instead
integration_issues.note: Expected behavior - works on mobile, uses fallback on web

frontend_ui_changes.map_button_in_header: VERIFIED - Map icon button visible on LEFT side of header, next to greeting 'شو ناكل اليوم؟'. Clicking navigates to nearby-map page
frontend_ui_changes.category_fixed_grid: VERIFIED - Categories display in fixed 5 columns × 2 rows grid layout, NOT horizontal scroll. Shows: الكل, برجر, بيتزا, مشاوي, سوري, فطائر, حلويات, قهوة, مشروبات, كوكتيل
frontend_ui_changes.featured_restaurants_with_star: VERIFIED - Featured section shows horizontal scroll with restaurant cards. Yellow star badge visible on featured restaurants
frontend_ui_changes.red_restaurant_cards: VERIFIED - Restaurant cards in 'المطاعم القريبة' section have RED (#C62828) background with white text. Shows name, cuisine, rating, delivery fee
frontend_ui_changes.floating_cart_button: VERIFIED - Red circular cart button floats in center of tab bar, elevated above other tabs

other_flows_tested.city_selector_modal: WORKING - Shows 'اختر منطقة التوصيل', GPS option, and cities list (دمشق, حلب, حمص, اللاذقية, طرطوس)
other_flows_tested.restaurant_detail_page: WORKING - Shows restaurant info, delivery details, menu categories, menu items with add-to-cart
other_flows_tested.tab_bar_navigation: WORKING - الرئيسية, طلباتي, cart (center), الإشعارات, حسابي
other_flows_tested.guest_access: WORKING - 'تصفح كضيف' button on login page allows browsing without authentication

critical_code_review_comments: Category grid correctly implemented using catRows with COLS=5 per row in home.tsx
Map button correctly positioned using flexDirection row-reverse RTL layout with greetRow style
Featured restaurants use featStar style with yellow (#FFD700) star icon
Restaurant cards use rCard style with backgroundColor: '#C62828' (dark red)
Floating cart button uses cartBtnOuter with top: -18px positioning in _layout.tsx
Splash screen config in app.json has backgroundColor: '#C62828' as requested
seed_data_creation: None - used existing restaurants in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: Session 4 complete. All new UI requirements verified: (1) Map button in header left of greeting text - WORKING, (2) Categories in fixed 5×2 grid NOT horizontal scroll - WORKING, (3) Featured restaurants with yellow star badges - WORKING, (4) Restaurant cards have red #C62828 background - WORKING, (5) Floating center cart button - WORKING. Backend healthy. City modal working with 5 Syrian cities. Restaurant detail page loads with menu items. Guest access via 'تصفح كضيف'. Note: Restaurant images stored with file:// iOS paths show Pexels fallback on web (expected).
